name: CutieBoard for iPhone
description:
Play with your food! CutieBoard is a fun ad-free charcuterie board simulator.
Simply select a food from the menu, then drag to place on the board.
Ideal for any chef planning a real charcuterie or grazing board for a party or event!
Have fun visually brainstorming meals & menus, or plan for cooking or catering.
Game Features:
- Casual free-form block style game, meant to relax and de-stress
- Over 200 types of food, including Desserts
- Freely compose the board in your own original designs
- Choose from a wide variety of foods, boards and background styles
- Screenshot Mode to save an external screenshot & share your design anywhere
- Relaxing sounds
- Peaceful music
- No Ads
